title: Cannot connect to server ? Server problems ?
body: So from yesterday, I keep losing my connection, and when I log out and log in again, it keep saying that I can't connect to the server. I did check my internet, router, etc, none of them fix. Infact, yesterday I played like more than 10 games and around 8th or 9th I lost my connection, I couldn't connect. It was very frustrating for me, and again I did check my internet, to the point where yesterday I watched youtube while waiting to be connect (it was around 15 min, my team surr at 40 min)

replies.body: I wasn't able to find any issues with the server.  You might be having an issue connecting to the game server specifically.  Check out the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to be sure and help resolve this for good.  Let me know if that helps!
